#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(0);
	int t, n, a, b;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		a = b = n / 4;
		bool flipflop = false;
		while (2 * a + 2 * b <= n)
		{
			flipflop = !flipflop;
			if (flipflop)
				a++;
			else
				b++;
		}
		if (flipflop)a--;
		else b--;
		cout << a*b << "\n";
	}
}
